welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ennepetal, Germany! Known for its charming nature and scenic landscapes, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay and all that Ennepetal has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Essen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving a variety of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited access throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No registration required.
